document_notes.text:
This update for kernel-firmware fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2023-31315: Fixed validation in a model specific register (MSR) that lead to modification of SMM configuration by malicious program with ring0 access (bsc#1229069)
document_notes.title: Details

notes.text: Improper validation in a model specific register (MSR) could allow a malicious program with ring0 access to modify SMM configuration while SMI lock is enabled, potentially leading to arbitrary code execution.
notes.title: Vulnerability Description
